signals.problem_statement: The AI copilot settings change unexpectedly, causing it to become disabled without user action.
signals.customer_ask: To understand why the settings change and ensure they remain enabled.
signals.context: Team size not specified, using AI features.

signals.problem_statement: The AI copilot does not assist in composing new emails, limiting its functionality for users who want to draft emails from knowledge base information.
signals.customer_ask: To have the copilot assist in composing new emails using information from the knowledge base.
signals.suggested_solution: To allow the copilot to create drafts for new emails.
signals.context: Team size not specified, using AI features.

signals.problem_statement: The AI sentiment analysis feature is not useful for the customer's business context, leading to dissatisfaction with the overall AI package.
signals.customer_ask: To reconsider the pricing structure based on the features they actually use.
signals.context: Team size not specified, evaluating AI features.

signals.problem_statement: There is uncertainty about the AI's language preference settings, specifically whether it uses American or British English.
signals.customer_ask: To clarify if there is an option to select the language preference for AI responses.
signals.context: Team size not specified, evaluating AI features.
